```{r pressure, echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
require(rrtable)
require(ztable)
require(xtable)
require(stringr)

data=sampleData3[17,]


HTML2latex=function(data){
    seek=c("\\{","\\}","_","~")
    replace=c("\\\\{","\\\\}","\\\\_","\\\\~{}")
    code=data.frame(seek,replace,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
 
    fnr=function(x){
        
        for(i in 1:nrow(code)){
            x=str_replace_all(x,code$seek[i],code$replace[i])
        }
        x
    }     

    data[]=lapply(data,fnr)
    data
}

data1=HTML2latex(data)

xtable(data)
print(ztable(data1),type="latex")
```
